front.title: American National Standard Radiation Protection Instrumentation Test and Calibration, Portable Survey Instruments

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Specific requirements are established for portable radiation protection instruments used for detection and measurement of levels of ionizing radiation fields or levels of radioactive surface contamination. An errata sheet for the standard is available at https://standards.ieee.org/content/dam/ieee-standards/standards/web/documents/erratas/N323A-1997_errata.pdf
